verses.verse: (A Maskil of Ethan the Ezrahite.) I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> To <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%> I will <S%H3045>make<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> with my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For I have <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2617>"Lovingkindness<s%> will be <S%H1129>built<s%> up <S%H5769>forever;<s%> In the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> Thou wilt <S%H3559>establish<s%> Thy <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>"
"I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with My <S%H972>chosen;<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%>

I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> And <S%H1129>build<s%> up your <S%H3678>throne<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%> <S%H5542>"Selah.<s%>

And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H3034>praise<s%> Thy <S%H6382>wonders,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> in the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H6918>ones.<s%>

For <S%H4310>who<s%> in the <S%H7834>skies<s%> is <S%H6186>comparable<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? Who among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H410>mighty<s%> is <S%H1819>like<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

A <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H6206>feared<s%> in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H6918>ones,<s%> And <S%H3372>awesome<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those who are <S%H5439>around<s%> Him?

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee, O <S%H2626>mighty<s%> <S%H3050>Lord<s%>? Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> also <S%H5439>surrounds<s%> Thee.
Thou dost <S%H4910>rule<s%> the <S%H1348>swelling<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> When its <S%H1530>waves<s%> <S%H5375>rise,<s%> Thou dost <S%H7623>still<s%> them.

Thou <S%H859>Thyself<s%> didst <S%H1792>crush<s%> <S%H7293>Rahab<s%> like one who is <S%H2491>slain;<s%> Thou didst <S%H6340>scatter<s%> Thine <S%H340>enemies<s%> with Thy <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H2220>arm.<s%>
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are Thine, the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> is Thine; The <S%H8398>world<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> it <S%H4393>contains,<s%> Thou hast <S%H3245>founded<s%> them.
The <S%H6828>north<s%> and the <S%H3225>south,<s%> Thou hast <S%H1254>created<s%> them; <S%H8396>Tabor<s%> and <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> at Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
Thou hast a <S%H1369>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm;<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5810>mighty,<s%> Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>

<S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> are the <S%H4349>foundation<s%> of Thy <S%H3678>throne;<s%> <S%H2617>Lovingkindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H6923>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee.

How <S%H835>blessed<s%> are the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H8643>joyful<s%> <S%H8643>sound!<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> they <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of Thy <S%H6440>countenance.<s%>
In Thy <S%H8034>name<s%> they <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day,<s%> And by Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> they are <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
For Thou art the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of their <S%H5797>strength,<s%> And by Thy <S%H7522>favor<s%> our <S%H7161>horn<s%> is <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
For our <S%H4043>shield<s%> belongs to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And our <S%H4428>king<s%> to the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H227>Once<s%> Thou didst <S%H1696>speak<s%> in <S%H2377>vision<s%> to Thy <S%H2623>godly<s%> <S%H2623>ones,<s%> And didst <S%H559>say,<s%> "I have <S%H7737>given<s%> <S%H5828>help<s%> to one <S%H1368>who<s%> is <S%H1368>mighty;<s%> I have <S%H7311>exalted<s%> one <S%H977>chosen<s%> from the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
"I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> My <S%H5650>servant;<s%> With My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> I have <S%H4886>anointed<s%> him,
With <S%H834>whom<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> will be <S%H3559>established;<s%> My <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> will <S%H553>strengthen<s%> him.
"The <S%H340>enemy<s%> will not <S%H5377>deceive<s%> him, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9390>wickedness<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him.
"But I shall <S%H3807>crush<s%> his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, And <S%H5062>strike<s%> those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> him.
"And My <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and My <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will be with him, And in My <S%H8034>name<s%> his <S%H7161>horn<s%> will be <S%H7311>exalted.<s%>
"I shall also <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> And his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> on the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>
"He will <S%H7121>cry<s%> to Me, 'Thou art my Father, My <S%H1>God,<s%> and the <S%H410>rock<s%> of my <S%H6697>salvation.<s%>'
"I <S%H637>also<s%> shall <S%H5414>make<s%> him [My] first-born, The <S%H5945>highest<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
"My <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> for him <S%H5769>forever,<s%> And My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall be <S%H539>confirmed<s%> to him.
"So I will <S%H7760>establish<s%> his <S%H2233>descendants<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> And his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
<S%H518>"If<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> My <S%H8451>law,<s%> And do not <S%H1980>walk<s%> in My <S%H4941>judgments,<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> they <S%H2490>violate<s%> My <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> And do not <S%H8104>keep<s%> My <S%H4687>commandments,<s%>
Then I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H6588>transgression<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> And their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H5061>stripes.<s%>
"But I will not <S%H6565>break<s%> off My <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> from him, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H8266>deal<s%> <S%H8266>falsely<s%> in My <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>
"My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> I will not <S%H2490>violate,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> will I <S%H8132>alter<s%> the <S%H4161>utterance<s%> of My <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H259>"Once<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by My <S%H6944>holiness;<s%> I will not <S%H3576>lie<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>
"His <S%H2233>descendants<s%> shall <S%H1961>endure<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> And his <S%H3678>throne<s%> as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> Me.
"It shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> like the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> And the <S%H5707>witness<s%> in the <S%H7834>sky<s%> is <S%H539>faithful.<s%>" <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
But Thou hast <S%H2186>cast<s%> <S%H2186>off<s%> and <S%H3988>rejected,<s%> Thou hast <S%H9378>been<s%> <S%H9378>full<s%> of <S%H9378>wrath<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> Thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H5010>spurned<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servant;<s%> Thou hast <S%H2490>profaned<s%> his <S%H5145>crown<s%> in the <S%H776>dust.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H6555>broken<s%> <S%H6555>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1448>walls;<s%> Thou hast <S%H7760>brought<s%> his <S%H4013>strongholds<s%> to <S%H4288>ruin.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> who <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>along<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8155>plunder<s%> him; He <S%H1961>has<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to his <S%H7934>neighbors.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H7311>exalted<s%> the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> of his <S%H6862>adversaries;<s%> Thou hast made <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H6864>edge<s%> of his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> And hast not made him <S%H6965>stand<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
Thou hast made his <S%H9184>splendor<s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> And <S%H4048>cast<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
Thou hast <S%H9527>shortened<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5934>youth;<s%> Thou hast <S%H5844>covered<s%> him with <S%H955>shame.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H5704>long,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>? Wilt Thou <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thyself <S%H5331>forever<s%>? Will Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>?

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> my <S%H2465>span<s%> of <S%H2465>life<s%> is; For <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> Thou hast <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men!<s%>

<S%H4310>What<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> can <S%H2421>live<s%> and not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%>? Can he <S%H4422>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>? <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H346>Where<s%> are Thy <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> Which Thou didst <S%H7650>swear<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%>?

<S%H2142>Remember,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servants;<s%> How I do <S%H5375>bear<s%> in my <S%H2436>bosom<s%> [the reproach of] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples,<s%>

With <S%H834>which<s%> Thine <S%H340>enemies<s%> have <S%H2778>reproached,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> With <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> the <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> of Thine <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5769>forever!<s%> <S%H543>Amen<s%> and <S%H543>Amen.<s%>
